dlonweb.title: Demos to show features of DLonWeb

deepd3.title: DeepD3 (A Deep Learning Framework for Detection of Dendritic Spines and Dendrites)
deepd3.source: Fernholz, M. H. P., Guggiana Nilo, D. A., Bonhoeffer, T., & Kist, A. M. (2024). DeepD3, an open framework for automated quantification of dendritic spines. In M. H. Hennig (Ed.), PLOS Computational Biology (Vol. 20, Issue 2, p. e1011774). Public Library of Science (PLoS). https://doi.org/10.1371/journal.pcbi.1011774
deepd3.description: Pre trained models to perform semantic segmentation of dendrites and dendrite spines in microscopy data
deepd3.model_input: Microscopy image stack in TIF/TIFF format
deepd3.model_output: Segmented stack with dendrites and dendritic spines

8f.title: Dendritic spine image segmentation for 8 base filters

16f.title: Dendritic spine image segmentation for 16 base filters

32f.title: Dendritic spine image segmentation for 32 base filters
